heroTitle: A Voice-Enabled Smart Rural Healthcare Assistant for Emergency and Preventive Care
aboutText1: GramHealth AI is a simple healthcare support web application designed for rural and semi-urban communities. It helps users understand the urgency of their symptoms, access basic health guidance, and get emergency help quickly, in low internet conditions.
aboutText2: The platform uses voice input and a clean, easy-to-use interface to make healthcare information more accessible, while clearly stating that it does not replace doctors or medical professionals.
voiceEnabledDesc: Easy voice input for better accessibility
lowInternetDesc: Functions even in slow or limited internet conditions
emergencySupportDesc: Quick SOS access for urgent situations
healthcareGuidanceDesc: Basic symptom assessment and health tips
aboutDisclaimer: GramHealth AI does not replace doctors or medical professionals. Always consult a qualified healthcare provider for proper diagnosis and treatment.
howItWorksDesc: Get health guidance in 3 simple steps
step1Desc: Use voice or text to describe what you're experiencing
step2Desc: Get immediate assessment of urgency level even in slow internet
step3Desc: Receive actionable health advice and when to seek help
whyChooseDesc: Built specifically for rural healthcare needs
benefit1Desc: Works perfectly in slow internet - ideal for rural areas with limited connectivity
benefit2Desc: Speak your symptoms in Hindi, Marathi or English
benefit3Desc: Get health guidance in under 1 second - no waiting
benefit4Desc: Completely free healthcare support for all communities
commonIssues: Common Health Issues We Help With
getStartedDesc: Access free healthcare guidance right now
aiSubtitle: Describe your symptoms and get instant health guidance
redFlags: Warning Signs - Seek Immediate Care If:
lowAdvice: Your symptoms appear mild. Rest well, stay hydrated, and monitor your condition. If symptoms worsen, consult a doctor.
mediumAdvice: Your symptoms need attention. Please consult a doctor within 24-48 hours. Avoid strenuous activity and take proper rest.
highAdvice: Your symptoms require immediate medical attention. Please visit the nearest hospital or call emergency services right away.
disclaimer: This is not a medical diagnosis. Please consult a qualified doctor for proper treatment.
sosConfirm: This will call emergency services (108). Do you want to proceed?
tip1: Describe symptoms clearly (e.g., fever, cough, pain location)
tip2: Mention duration (e.g., since 2 days, started this morning)
voiceNotSupported: Voice input is not supported in your browser
analysisError: Failed to analyze symptoms. Please check your connection and try again.
loginToContact: Please login to contact the doctor.
loginToLocate: Please login to access location details.
name: Name
errorRemovingDoctor: Error removing doctor. Please try again.
confirmRemoveDoctor: Are you sure you want to remove Dr.
noMedicinesAvailable: No medicines available at the moment.
addMedicinePrompt: Click the + button to add a medicine.
errorRemovingMedicine: Error removing medicine. Please try again.
confirmRemoveMedicine: Are you sure you want to remove
